Title: Enacts the "New York urban and community tree planting and forestry program act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York urban and community tree planting and forestry program act"; provides for education, technical assistance and support for tree planting and forestry projects in urban areas and disadvantaged communities.
LawCode: Add Art 9 Title 23 §§9-2301 - 9-2311, En Con L; add §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "New York urban and community tree planting and forestry program act"
